C. Oddities: There are only four possible values that the 
푦

outcome can take, which might not 
be realistic. For example, there is no scenario where customer satisfaction is anything other 
than 6, 47.5, 60, or 95.5. Als
o, maybe Vitamin C and E are better modeled as numeric values 
(e.g. the amount in a product) rather than binaries.
